name: Perfectionist CP+R Wrinkle Lifting/Firming Serum
about: What it is:A powerful anti-wrinkle serum that helps reduce the look of lines and wrinkles..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Serum.What Else You Need to Know:Estee Lauder’s Perfectionist CP+R Wrinkle Lifting/Firming Serum uses breakthrough CPR-75 Technology to significantly help reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Skin feels smoother, looks fresher, younger, and more perfected over time.
ingredients: Dimethicone, Water, Polysilicone-11, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Silica, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Methicone, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Extract, Coleus Forskohlii Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Fish (Pisces) Collagen, Palmaria Palmata Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Silybum Marianum (Lady'S Thistle) Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract/Extrait D'Orge, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Artemia Extract, Pantethine, Algae Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Cholesterol, Squalane, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Zea Mays (Corn) Kernel Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Caffeine, Whey Protein/Lactis Protein/Proteine Du Petit-Lait, Linoleic Acid, Lecithin, Fish (Pisces) Collagen, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Glycerin, Yeast Extract/Faex/Extrait De Levure, Polyquaternium-51, Phytosphingosine, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Decarboxy Carnosine Hcl, Polysorbate 40, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Sodium Pca, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Zinc Pca, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Isohexadecane, Peg-8, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polysorbate 80, Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate, Laureth-12, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Beta-Sitosteryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance, Disodium Edta, Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) ...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply on clean skin before your moisturizer. .-Pay particular attention to your deepest wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an expensive PRIMER! If you have large pores it will cause blackheads and breakouts. It felt heavy as expected because it’s silicone! Makeup slid off and looked a mess after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the first ingredient in the ingredient list is SILICONE!!! Which is why so many reviews say they see “improvement” after first use, this is not true improvement. It’s just filling the wrinkles with silicone which is what you can do with any silicone based makeup primer. I’ve gotten a bunch of samples of it and was really excited to try it since I have heard amazing reviews of the night serum. This may work for some if they love silicone makeup primers, I don’t so I will definitely not purchase this. Be careful with silicones if you have acne prone skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I bought this when I was 28 I didn’t see.a different right away but it pay off to use something like this now am 38. I put this on my face and not my neck and that was a mistake now I see the difference between my face and neck.  This cream did work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the real thing! During pregnancy I was disappointed when I realized Botox is a no no (Duh :) Started doing research on every product under the sun and consistently noticed every website related to anti-wrinkle or anti-aging leads back to this product and most everyone gives a POSITIVE review.  Purchased this along with perfectionist pro (instant filler) After the first use I could tell a difference. I’m excited to see how this works over the next 6 months. Either way, I’m definitely thankful I found something to at least help while I’m without the Xeomin/Botox.  A few hundred dollars isn’t a bad price, considering you get a good amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels like baby skin right after, so smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product since it first came out years ago. I recently tried a similar product from PTR, but I came back. It works, especially on the neck and around the eyes. My skin looks soft and toned on the face and neck, and eye wrinkles are diminished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product for my neck area to slow aging process most visible there. It's not a miracle in a bottle but it works well if you use it continuously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum.  My skin feels so soft afterwards and already my crows feet are a little less visible.  The scent is amazing

reviews.review_title: Silky texture, works well as a primer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is always a staple in my makeup routine! I’ve been using this as a makeup primer for awhile now and I love how it makes my skin feel. It give a powdery, silky finish on the skin which makes for a nice makeup base. I honestly can’t say if I have seen any actual skin benefits from it because I really only use it before my makeup routine but I always get compliments on how nice my skin looks. I will continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not do anything to the wrinkles, I did not see any improvements on my face... such a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum! I have acne and wrinkles, and have tried many brands but it’s hard to find a serum that doesn’t make me breakout. This serum is so silky, and gives the skin a light glow. I also use it above my eyes where I have started to notice some light wrinkles. In just a week I started to notice a difference. I only use it at night because I use other products during the day to control oil, but still have noticed a difference. I always let it sit for a few minutes before I apply a thicker night moisturizer. My skin always feels so soft in the AM. I will never use anything other serum again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is bogus. it’s like perfume basically with dimethicone nothing wrinkle lifting or firming about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptic when ordering I have sensitive skin so I usually stick with what I know cause when I venture I end up with disturbed skin. I’m so happy I decided to get this. I know the price seems steep but you get a good amount as I have shown I the picture. I can tell a difference in just 24 hours. My skin has never been happier, looked,and felt better EL knocked it out of the park with this. I also use EL moisturizer after the revitalizing supreme+ global anti-aging. First time using that product absolutely perfect combination. This serum can easily be used as a primer not oiley at all so smooth feels really light and nice on skin. My skin absolutely soaks this up. Way to go EL I’m 39 and my skin has never looked and felt better.

reviews.review_title: Expensive and leaves skin feeling matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On the fence with this one.  I like the advanced night repair, but decided to try this one since I have some pretty deep forehead wrinkles.  It sinks in immediately which is nice so it's def. not greasy at all, but it's the matte feeling I just don't like.  It leaves your skin feeling a bit tight, which I get because it is called firming and lifting  I'm willing to try it for a bit longer to see if I get any results, We'll see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face didn't love this product. Cause a few breakouts and pilled a little if I touched my face. But my neck loves it. Leaves it feeling silky smooth. It's way too pricey though to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not hydrating at all. My skin feels tight and dry after using it. Not recommended in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it 10 stars, I would. I think this stuff is impressive none the less. It makes my skin feels smooth and matte. I had tiny lines under my eyes, and just using this for a few days.. It seems to improve them.  I am trying to wait a while before I go get my filler for a little of my eye hollowing, and this seems to be helping a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is so good. It’s Hydrating, makes my skin feel so soft, it’s not oily or liquidy like most serums, it’s a bit thicker, so it stays where you put it on your skin, no need to rub it all around, it absorbs readily. Worth the money, and lasted me a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The term holy grail is often overused - and this is the only time I have used it to describe a product. I discovered this serum 6 years ago and found myself going back to it time after time. Nothing else has measured up, so I have been using it exclusively for 3 years. Fine lines are definitely diminished, and my skin feels smooth. This wears very well under primer or makeup, but it also gives your skin a smooth look on its own. This is worth the splurge, sis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about a month now. I have noticed the large indents in my forehead become less visible. I also like to product as it’s not sticky, makes the skin feel smooth. I will continue to use the whole bottle and then see what the results are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this on and off and decided to start using it again.  It’s effective and I love that it has no shine to it.  It blends perfectly with any moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never written a review before, but when I saw the rating I felt compelled. This is a mainstay 5 star product. At the time I’m writing this review it’s at 4.3 stars....BS. This deserves the full 5 stars easily. Smooths the skin leaving a glow unlike any other serum I’ve used. Not sticky and doesn’t interfere with makeup application. Truly leaves a perfect appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum works to reduce the look of fine and deep lines over time. It is expensive, but well worth the cost. It is my holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would give this 100 stars if I could. I’ve been using this for at least 10 years. I find it really helps with redness, pores, and skin clarity. I tend to skip around and try new skincare, from inexpensive to very expensive (La Mer, SKII).  Occasionally I’ll stop using it, and within days I can tell the difference in my skin. Great for my hyper sensitive skin. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and so far I am loving it. The texture feels amazing. Not sticky at all. Has a light clean scent. Hasn’t broken out my face. My makeup glides easily over it. Don’t even need a primer. Will be buying a full size bottle. Loving this so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is another product I keep going back to. As I'm getting older, I noticed I need to use a lot more product, but I like that it not only hydrates and tightens my skin some, it also acts like a primer and hides imperfections as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I hoped it would reduce pores visibility on my face. I read good review about it. The company website said it noncomedogenic. However, I regret buying this because it causes breakouts. My face is now full of pimples. I do not recommend this product for acne prone and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 3 years, and it always feels extremely silky on my skin upon applying. I love the feeling of supplement after I have applied the product. I usually use two squirts of the pump, and it is enough product to cover my whole face. I have oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed.  Been using this product for over two weeks with no noticeable difference in my fine lines.  I did give it three stars because my skin looks healthier since using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is just a bunch of silicones that give the appearance of smooth skin, but does absolutely nothing.  It’s a waste of money... its like an overly priced primer basically. On the other hand highly recommend the night repair serum is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sorry ladies!  This does nothing for wrinkles and the texture of old time primers makes it even worse!  Shouldn't even be called a serum.  Not even any moisture here.  Not sure what purpose this serves??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A keeper of a serum. Goes on light, not greasy. I have been using this product for years and am more than satisfied with the quality of my skin. It keeps wrinkles at bay and is great for my throat as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: keeps skin looking fresh and glowing. Used for 4 years. cannot do without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After one bottle my very deep forehead lines are much less noticeable. I’ve struggled with them for a few years and this serum is HOLY GRAIL! I use this as a primer on my face for a perfect blend as well!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for about a month and have been pleased with the results thus far. Instantly slightly plumps fine lines and I've seen a noticeable difference in my skin both in firmness and clarity since using. I use two pumps every morning, but would probably see more benefits if I used twice daily. Fast absorbing, nice smell, and very lightweight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Estée Lauder for years, even in my 20s before I needed “anti-aging” products and I had beautiful skin. With continued use, my skin was great for years, and I had no wrinkles on my 40th birthday. One day for some reason I got it in my head that I needed to be using more natural products, silicone free and no fragrance blah blah blah. I convinced myself that the Estée Lauder that had never let me down was now bad for me. I’m almost 44 and I’ve had terrible skin for the last couple of years, spending tons of money at Sephora on “natural” brands. What a joke! Nothing works like this, and a few other tried and true things from Estée Lauder. I feel so dumb for straying. Estée Lauder for life!!! If you are reading this and debating the purchase, just buy it. The line is semi pricey, but your regimen will last a long time and the items are very reasonable considering the results you get!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am combo skin and mid 30’s, my skin used to be super oily and now I have an oily t-zone but dry (super red) patches. Fun right? I got Botox on my forehead around 33 because I started getting pretty noticeable lines. First plus about this serum, my skin looks so much smoother. I budget for Botox this year and I don’t even need it! Extra vacation $$$$. Don’t get me wrong, this serum is stupid expensive. That said, 2nd huge bonus is that it makes your skin feel like silk after applying it. Sooooo smooth. Makeup goes on like a dream and it does not make me oily! I love this stuff. Besides the price I can say that it has one more negative, it takes a lot t cover my whole face. This little jar only lasted me a month and most serums that size last me 4-6. I can’t take off a star because the product is so amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m writing this review on behalf of my mom, who I purchased this item for. She’s 55 and is beginning to get concerned about her facial contours (wrinkles to her, marks of happiness to me!). So she religiously used this all up in a time span of about 3 months every single day.  Not only did she feel way more confident but she told me her friends even mentioned to her that she looks more youthful.   Sounds pretty good to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to say but this did nothing for me. Maybe because I don't have any significant signs of aging at 28, but I found it didn't make my skin more radiant either. I bought it because of the hyped up reviews and used it for a year every night and found no difference in my skin at all. I wanted to like it but felt it had a very silicone after feel as well :( oh well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what they put in this stuff, but I have to have it on my skin before I apply my foundation every day. My skin looks much younger than it did before I starting using it a couple of years ago. I will not go without my purple serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WORKS GOOD UNDER FOUNDATION BUT PERSONALLY I DIDN'T NOTICE ANY DIFFERENCE OR ACTUAL IMPROVEMENT IN SKIN TONE OR WRINKLES BECAUSE OF IT AND I USED THE ENTIRE BOTTLE.  BUT FOR A SMOOTHER OR PRIMER IT WORKS FINE BUT IS DEFINITELY AN EXPENSIVE OPTION TO PRIME.

I had VERY VERY deep smile lines and was desperate to find relief short of fillers which is why I blindly (I knew no one who has used this) purchased this product. I used a small amount on my laugh lines, but since I was targeting an area decided to use it on my forehead (not an area of concern, but had lines and felt it could not hurt). I faithfully used this product every morning and night SPARINGLY (seriously, the smallest amount for each area) and one day I realized my lines were 85% improved and I had only used 1/2 of the 1.7 oz bottle. I stopped using the product over 11 months and still have the same result. I don't recommend discontinued use, I just got lazy. I will continue to use what I have because I paid for it. As long as the formula remains the same, I would repurchase this product again. I have VERY oily skin so please allow any product used an opportunity to soak into the skin. This product is NOT oily.

I have tried many products and THIS IS THE BEST I have ever had. I used it consistently for a year thinking oh I won't see a difference but I was pleasantly surprised. My fine lines on my forehead are gone and even my fiancé noticed. I would 10000000% recommend this product for anyone. It is perfect for Day and Night.

reviews.review_title: I'M here only for this badboy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: READ MY STORY PLEASE I'm from México, i registered here after i saw the few reviews this amazing serum have and since i dont want it to get discontinnued, i decide to write my experience, sorry for my english.  As i said before, i find disturbing that this serum have such few reviews, it's one of the few serums that actually worked, and i am a beauty junkie, but this serum goes beyond all of them...  Let me tell you my story... 3 years ago i needed to change my serum, i was using The Regenarating serum by LaMer but suddenly i felt like they changed the formula, it was more watery and not really working abymore, so after doing my research as i always do i bought this and BOOM i used for a year and half straight, purchasing several botteles a year, since the 50 ml lasts like 4 months or a little more aprox. Well during that time, i HAD THE BEST SKIN OF MY LIFE, but, since i used other products i never really gave this serum the credit for my amazing skin. I use it in the eye area too, so i was using it in the whole face, so sadly, since i am a beauty junkie (not always is the best thing trust me) the new estee lauder serum, NEW DIMENSION came, and the list of ingredients was amazing so i decided to ask for a sampler, i got several ones, i loved it, so i thought i found a replacement for PERFECTIONIST... so i started using it, even in the eye area, at the beggining it was amazing, my skin looked amazing, plumpy and healthy, then my eye area started getting a little weird so i stopped, then i realize that you shouldn't use the new dimension serukm in the eye area, so i continue using my regular night serum and eye cream in the night and only the new dimension and eye cream during the day, my face started changing, and not looking as great as bfore, it was not only the texture of the sking, it was everything overall, i keep wondering what it was, the hollows under my eyes came back, the dark circles, the smile lines, i started thinking if maybe i loose weight and that was the reason, all the baby fat that keep the face full and plump maybe was gone because of that? but no, my diet, weight, exercise, and lifestyle remain the same... So after thinking what was different, i realzed that my face was looking exactly like before PERFECTIONIST (i didn't even remember this serum since i never thought gave it the credit for my amazing looks) i even started thinking i need it fillers to look as healthy and plumped as i looked during the perfectionist era so i research the ingredients on this serum and it have cholesterol, linoleic acid among others, super simple yet effective ingredients that ACT LIKE FILLERS when they are applied topically.. so i started using the rest of my new dimension serum in hands and neck and i bought again PERFECTIONIST, i've been using it since May and OMG, guys seriously no joking, now i can totally give it credit for my skin, i can already see my eye area more plumped, the skin lifted and clear, the remain serum that i have on my fingers i use it on my lips ans even them look fuller...  PLEASE EsteeLauder, never discontinue this product, and if your skin is dry use a good moisturizer after this serum and give it a good try every day for more than 2 or 3 months, its amazing have it builds the skin, is like a liquid filler OVER TIME, not instantly, hope this helps and again sorry for my english oops

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 25 years.  I apply it religiously as the first layer of my morning skin care regime.  Until about five years ago, it single-handedly and dramatically softened the furrow between my brows.  In my late 40s, I decided to give it a little help and get Botox, but I still use this product daily and always will.

I find this product very drying. To me upon application, it feels very much like any of the primers loaded with silicon in it, very slippery and easy to spread out but it just sit on the skin and won't absorb. My face feels dry and tight, almost to a wrinkly extent (although it doesn't look like it in the mirror). It does blur my pores and even out my skin tone like a good primer would do, but I don't think it's doing anything skin care wise. I use it mainly for minimal makeup days to get a blurry effect but it's too expensive for what it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for six weeks and didn't see any of the results I was hoping for, mainly firming and smoothing. It didn't irritate my skin, which is great, but it also didn't seem to do anything. I did not find it to be drying, as some do, but it did feel like it sat on my skin as opposed to absorbing into it. Oh well, on to the next product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saw noticeable improvement the first time I bought this, just replenished my bottle and have added Verso day and night cream to the mix. Not sure, but am having a bad reaction. I am assuming it is the Verso since I saw noticeable improvement last time. Skin glowed. Lines were less noticeable. Pleasant to apply, soft and moisturizing without being heavy.
Read reviews and thought I was getting the pot of gold.  I use it daily in the morning and have had no changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: im 28 and love skin care. This is great stuff. i Have not used for very long so fine line are still their. I am so excited about this product. yes its tacky but it feels nice.
Improves the look and texture of skin. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product 3 stars because I did feel and see improvement in softness and firmness in the first week and then it just maintained after that. My big problem with the product is that it is dry, not drying, but dry. I would do one or two pumps of product, dot it all over my face and by the time I was ready to spread it around, it had absorbed or dried and I had to use more product. To me, it might be an ok product, but definitely not a good value. I will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ten years ago, I started trying to find ant-wrinkle products to reduce upper lip fine lines and I have found it with the  Perfectionist CP+R Wrinkle Lifting/Firming Serum. It completely reduces the upper lip wrinkles and facial lines. I would definately recommend using this product. Its excellent to use if you don't want to resort to Botox and fillers.

This is the first review I have ever done. I just have to write one for this product. It is the best I have ever used. I have acne prone skin and usually am reluctant to use new products. I love love this cream. It goes on so nice isn't greasy at all. My skin has never looked better. It's really an amazing cream. Will definitely buy it again.

I like the way this smells (floral, soapy, perfumey - a lot like Estée Lauder's Soft Clean foaming cleanser), but it has a sticky-ish and sort of dry consistency that feels like it does not absorb into the layers of the skin.   The formula itself feels dry. I always apply moisturizer after serum, but I still want a serum to spread easily and evenly, even if it is not particularly moisturizing. I make sure my face is soaked with toner before I apply, otherwise I find I need to use way more product than recommended.   My skin felt and appeared smoother immediately, but it was more of primer mask than it was my actual skin. There is just no way it happens that fast.  Regardless of its claims, the way this product feels is the reason I don't think it offers nourishment or protection to the structure of the skin.   That said, this is a nice sort of makeup primer or blurring product.
I can always tell the difference when I forget to put this product on under my foundation. This product creates such a smooth, flawless effect. I think it's worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome serum. I use it once a day, in the morning before applying makeup. It feels and works like a primer! It has a very smooth, silicon-y texture and instantly diminishes the look of pores and fine lines. I am almost finished with my bottle, and I think I may try something different next (just because of all the options on the market!) but I will certainly come back to this in the future!

I am in my early 20s, and I don't need an anti aging product but I want to start preventing the aging process and my friend recommended this. I use the double wear concealer and foundation and love this brand. Anyway the very first time I put this on I had just washed my face and I had a milk breakout and it immediately soothed my face and made it feel like velvet! It's amazing I use it day and night after washing my face and definitely won't be stopping any time soon
I started a new skin care routine using this.  I also used it in conjunction with a skin inc. sample product.  I've gotten more compliments than ever before.  I'm not changing a thing.  Lol

I'm in love with this product since the first time I tried it! It keeps my skin smooth and firm and not oily at all during the day time. I only use it during day time because I use hydrated serum for night time

I just turned 30 and felt like I needed to up my skincare game. I have some wrinkles on my forehead that I typically get Botox for, but because I'm trying to get pregnant I had to take a break from it. I started using this serum day and night and my wrinkles seem to be kept at bay! I am thrilled and this has totally surpassed my expectations. It soaks into the skin and, followed by a moisturizer, it wears well under makeup. This is a new holy grail item for me!
This product is good, but I don't love it. I think it's ok. It does go on smoothing and makes my skin feel soft. Has lotion like feel to it and it's not sticky or anything like that.

I've read couple comments say, it's only for oily skin since it make your skin dry. But, girls, it's serum. It means you need to use lotion or cream after as a finish. If you don't add anything after, of course it will dry out since it's just a serum. For most type of serum, you need to add lotion or cream to lock it in. Otherwise, they will get dry and you are just wasting the products  Anyway, I have a dry skin.  I found ive got couple fine lines between my eyebrows 1 weeks ago. Then I found this serum sample in my skin care box. And I used it. Just after couple days, they are all gone. Of course I'm trying to use more moisturize and oil too since I've got super dry skin condition during those days because of the weather.   I believe the serum works! Add more moisturize products will help for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this serum for about 3yrs now and it is amazing! It makes my skin look so flawless, soft, moisturized and smooth as a baby's bottom. STOP looking for another serum, you found it right here! It's worth the price, a little goes a long way. I hate serums that don't absorb right into the skin, this one does it immediatley! LOVE THIS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used Estée Lauder many years ago and loved it then. But you know how you end up wandering away because you're hoping something even better is out there? Well, I'm back. This serum is the best. My dry, aging skin loves it. It's richly moisturizing- the perfect layer beneath my day cream. And I can really see a difference in my fine lines. My skin looks smoother, more plumped up.

reviews.review_title: can't go a day without it.
reviews.review_text: Best serum I've ever used. Helps reduce fine lines and brightens up my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is unlike any other. It exceeds its claims and is the Holy Grail of serums. I've tried many over the years and this is hands down, no holds bar the most amazing elixir ever. Non greasy and just makes the skin smooth, silky and bye bye fine lines. It also smells good but has no adverse reactions either with break outs or sensitivity. Its name says Perfectionist and it truly is! Thank you Sephora and Este Lauder.

I bounce from product to product looking for the right firming/wrinkle serum and have found it here. I saw results within the first day (no joke) and I'm excited to see what use after time does. I'm 45 and thankfully do not have many lines, wrinkles, or droop but I have begun seeing loose skin under my eyes. I have an oily but clear complexion and this serum does not make me oilier. In fact, it helps to tame oil. I do seem to have to use a lot of product but I'm still getting acquainted with it. I will continue buying this to keep me looking ageless (friends call me a vampire). It goes under your normal skin care creams morning and or evening. I know it's pricey but well worth it if you your skin needs a little help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrific serum to use daily under moisturizer. Noticeably reduces fine lines and wrinkles, makes my skin look beautiful. I periodically use other serums and moisturizers, but always come back to Estée Lauder's Perfectionist and Resilience Lift moisturizer. People often are surprised to learn I'm 43; this product is the reason I look younger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love other serums from Estee lauder. This one didn't disappoint me. I am not sure how much it helps with long term skin quality but I know for sure it provides the skin with smooth silky texture with blurring effects. I love using it during day time under my make up. It works great!

This makes my skin velvety soft and smooth, shrinks pores and brightens without shine. Mostly because it contains primer, but when i use it more often i do also notice it lightens my freckles/sun spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this 2x daily, after the Estee Lauder Micro Essence and the Dr. Dennis Gross ferulic acid + retinol solution. I use about 3 pumps on my face, 2 on my neck, one on my chest and the 1.7oz lasts me about a month and a half. I could use it once a day, but I really love this serum. I have had no reactions to it, it applies evenly and smoothly, and makes my face look dewy and just better overall. It could be used as a primer, it's that good. I have been using this formula for quite some time, after breaking out using their advanced night repair formula, and I couldn't be happier. Not moisturizing, but works well with other treatments as a preventative serum. Will continue to repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my mom a while back, and she is already on her third bottle. She says her skin feels so much softer/smoother when she is using this product in her regimen. It is rare for her to rave about a product, so I know this is a total must-have.

The name of this serum really suits it well, it truly is perfection in a bottle. My Grandmother, who is 76 and looks about 60, swears by Estée Lauder so the first time I ever thought about anti-aging products, which was about 6 years ago when I turned 27, I thought about Estée Lauder. The ANR serum was the first I ever tried and it really helped to even out my skin tone and it was a great preventative measure. Now that I'm 34, I felt the need to try something geared more toward repairing and this is truly amazing. I have a lot of marks from past breakouts, large pores, and some fine lines mostly in the places where I used to get bad breakouts and this has helped with all of those issues. It's helped over time and better yet, it helps improve the look of my skin instantly. The texture is silky and the silicones in it help to minimize pores, lines, acne scars, and it works so well under makeup. It didn't dry my skin out as others have stated but then again, I still have a very oily t-zone. Oh and the silicone in it isn't overbearing. It's just the right balance - my skin can still breath yet it helps to make my face much smoother. This is one of the few serums on the market I can honestly say is worth the money.

I'm still in my twenties so I didn't get this with the hope of reducing wrinkles but after using this for a little over a week the few expression lines that have started to form have suddenly disappeared. I can't believe how well it works! I will definitely keep using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this now for a few months. I was wary at first, as it is not marketed as a moisturizing serum, and I have dry skin. But it has made such a difference in my skin! I use the Algenist melting cleanser, then apply the Lancome Tonique Confort (the pink liquid) before applying this serum. It leaves my skin so soft and smooth, without any tightness at all. My moisturizer goes on flawlessly over this. It may seem expensive, but three small pumps is all you need, and the large bottle I have is only half done after 4 months! I will definitely be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Gen-x/y cusp marketing professional who is obsessed with buying and trying trusted and trendy brands to see what works. My combination skin can be semi-sensitive so I'm a stickler when it comes to writing reviews and relying on them. This product is one of the few I will give a full five star. The scent and texture is light and I wake up with the softest face/neck. <3 <3 <3 worth it's weight in price, trust me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed changes almost immediatly. I started using Estee Lauder only after receiving samples from sephora then buying a holiday special box. wow Im a true fan!

reviews.review_title: Great if you have super oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely tightens but made my skin super dry and peely. Had to return, would reconsider purchasing in summer months.

I really like this product I remember getting as a sample in a small bottle.I remember using it and you can tell the difference.I use stuff regularly so after awhile its just part of routine.Great product!You do not realize how good something is sometimes until you dont have it anymore or you try somthing else and you notice how nice this product is.You cannot go wrong with this but remember its part of a system skincare.You cannot just use one part and expect miracles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for over 4 years now and I love it ! My skin feels like silk after putting it on and I can see a big improvement in the texture and brightness , also plumps up fine lines ,makeup goes on smooth excellent product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite product from the Estee Lauder skincare line. I have tried the majority of their skincare products before, and this is definitely one of the best. It effectively reduces the look of any fine lines, wrinkles, and even large pores. Without makeup my skin already looks instantly better. Even though it is quite pricey, I feel that it is worth it.
Feels like velvet on your skin, I have only tried a sample bottle before. I'm not sure how i feel about the pump applicator but i love what's inside that bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and didn't uses it at first be issue I didn't have wrinkles. Then I read some information about this product and found that it contains very good ingredients for skin. So I started to use it under my eyes. I saw some reduction in a fine line. But then I used it on my cheek, wher I recently saw an enlarge pore and I saw a reduction in size. The article I read said that this product is good for lifting and I saw that when I applied to my cheek. The pores are a lot smaller then they were before. So I have have ordered a larger bottle.

reviews.review_title: ok, but i guess im alergic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it for a month, and the first 3 weeks i loved it. I used it around my eyes and temples to prevent wrinkles (the staff told me it was ok to use near the eyes) I do have oily skin, and my eye area is never dry, but i decided to use it since i dont want to have wrinkles. After the 3rd week when i was doing my make up, my eye shadows didn't look as smooth as always, and i noticed some texture in the areas, like tiny pumps, after i stopped using it, and a soft exfoliating, I didn't have any bumps or texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is best for someone who has oily skin. The serum is very light creamy. After application, your skin become very matte and smooth, like you have applied face primer. At first I loved it because the texture so smooth, thought would be perfect before foundation. Well, It did. My issue with it, not moisturizing enough. During mid day, I feel dry on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this serum, i bought it together with the cream, i live in Miami so it's to hummed and this is great doesn't show on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel, helps with dryness and is mattifying as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin and spent a lot of time at the beach in the sun. Sunscreen was not heard of in the 70's so now I have sun damaged skin. I have tried so many serums, creams and lotions all to no avail. A friend suggested that I try this. I fell in love with it and it is now a part of my everyday skin regimen. It has helped with the fine lines around my mouth as well as helped improve my overall skin tone. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for a serum to minimize my 11 and lines on my forehead that are starting to bug me. I can see them in the rear view mirror when I am driving. I have tried many high end serums and got this one in a pack with 2 other items and this was a full size. In just one month it is noticeably improved. YAY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my day cream! It makes my skin look smooth and healthy and matifies it a little, too.

Definetly one of EL´s best. You will really love this product, it leaves your skin soft with a matte finish and after a month of using it I can already see results! My skin appears renewed and the texture and tone have also already improved noticeably. I will definetly re purchase this one!

reviews.review_title: Smoothes and corrects oily or dry appearance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about this product, and I've been using it for 4-5 years, is the way it smoothes your skin out and at the same time corrects the overall appearance. If my face is oily as it tends to get by afternoon, putting a dab of this on mats it down; but if my face is looking dry, like my upper lip or around my eyes often do, it plumps and softens the area. Not sure about the long term effects, but I look pretty good for such an old gal & I think this helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this face serum and had it sitting around for some time, and then I decided to try it. I used it only a couple of times and was completely blown away. First of all it goes on like silk, leaving my skin with a velvety finish almost immediately. only a few small dabs cover my whole face well. I always mist my face with a toner to allow me to use less of my costly skin products. I noticed right away that my skin felt buttery soft and smooth after applying this serum. I also noticed that my fine lines were less noticeable and I was looking really closely LOL!!! I am definitely going to buy the full size of this product. I have never been a great lover of Estee Lauder products. I kind of associated EL as an older woman's make up line, but I guess I am an older woman now so here I am. Just kidding I was really wowed by this serum and it does what it says it does. well worth the money, just apply sparingly and the full size bottle should last quite a long while. I am actually not finished with my tiny tester sized bottle yet. LOL
